import './SideBar.scss' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import basket from '../../assets/basket-black.svg' import close from '../../assets/close.svg' import instagram from '../../assets/instagram.svg' import telegram from '../../assets/telegram.svg' import facebook from '../../assets/facebook.svg' import vk from '../../assets/vk.svg' function SideBar(props) { const funcSetIsOpenSide = () => { props.setIsOpenSide(false) } return (
